name: Reference - How Does Antivirus Quarantine Work? - Safety Detectives
x_kb_abstract: Your antivirus has just finished a regular scan and it’s asking whether you want to quarantine the virus it’s found. You click ‘yes’ without putting much thought into what’s actually happening. But what does quarantining actually mean, what does it do and is it safe for your computer? It’s important to understand the details so that you know what’s happening when you send infected files into quarantine.
